page.title: Fla. Businessman Sues Ex-NYSE Director
page.text: MIAMI (Reuters) - A Florida businessman has sued former New York Stock Exchange director Kenneth Langone for \$1.8 billion, claiming he made false statements about data management company Seisint in hopes that ChoicePoint Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CPS.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CPS.N</A> could buy it for a low price.
